name: God of Failure
description: Defend your castle from the orcish chavs, lure them into your traps and destroy them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32-bit) Processor: 2.66 Ghz (2 Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4870 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: 3.0 Ghz (4 Core) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon HD7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
